# kAudioSessionMode_Measurement

**Global Variable**

Specify this mode if your app is performing measurement of incoming audio.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioSessionMode_Measurement: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

When this mode is in use, the device does not perform automatic gain adjustment on incoming audio. For use with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionCategory_RecordAudio] or [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionCategory_PlayAndRecord] audio session categories. On devices with more than one built-in microphone, the primary microphone is used.

This mode is equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Mode-swift.struct/measurement] mode provided in the AVFoundation framework.

## Constants

- **kAudioSessionMode_Default**: The default mode; used unless you set a mode with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioSessionSetProperty(_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioSessionMode_VoiceChat**: Specify this mode if your app is performing two-way voice communication, such as using Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP).
- **kAudioSessionMode_VideoRecording**: Specify this mode if your app is recording a movie.
- **kAudioSessionMode_GameChat**
